scripts.docker:build: yarn build && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t tkurki/grafana-signalk:latest --load .
scripts.docker:push: yarn build && (((! docker buildx ls  | grep -q multibuilder) && docker buildx create --name multibuilder) || docker buildx use multibuilder) && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm/v7 -t tkurki/grafana-signalk:latest --push .
